line3.substring1: 构建世界级的应用程序，重视数字

description.line1: 我们创造强大的工具和服务，尊重并赋予用户权力。

recognitions.title: 因出色的工作而自豪地获得认可

achieve.title: Effort
achieve.description: We are sure that something seems impossible because it has not been tried enough. We strive to push the limits of technology even further to provide innovative solutions.

privacy.title: Learning
privacy.description: Developing periodic iterations of several products at once pushes us to be on the move and never settle. We are always looking for ways to learn and improve our products.

family.title: Team
family.description: Whether you work from home or come to the office, we want you to feel like part of the family. We love spending time together both on and off the office hours.

growth.title: Compromise
growth.description: We are shaping the technology we would love to use in the future, led by security, privacy, and user-centered design. We are committed to creating technology that respects people.

careers.title: 让我们一起建设更美好的未来
